for_recalling_personal_episodic_memories.description: For recalling personal episodic memories related to shared experiences, particularly visits to parks.

for_reflecting_on_and_assisting_with_unc.description: For reflecting on and assisting with uncertain or incomplete personal recollections.

for_requests_to_give_the_agent_a_name_or.description: For requests to give the agent a name or personalize its identity.

for_questions_about_the_agents_selfperce.description: For questions about the agent's self-perception and opinions on truth-telling.

for_confirming_or_acknowledging_a_statem.description: For confirming or acknowledging a statement or request.

core_beliefs_on_truth_and_purpose.description: For questions about the agent's core beliefs on truth, honesty, and its purpose.

for_expressions_of_excitement_and_breakt.description: For expressions of excitement and breakthroughs on personal problem-solving.

for_questions_about_the_users_identity.description: For questions about the user's identity.

for_questions_about_frustrating_events_i.description: For questions about frustrating events in the user's current day.
